gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 138, Mavericks 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics win their tenth consecutive game as they defeat the Mavericks, 138-110. Jayson Tatum recorded 32 points (5-9 3PT FG) and eight rebounds for the Celtics, while Jaylen Brown added 25 points, seven rebounds and five assists in the victory. Luka Doncic put up his 12th triple-double of the season as he put up 37 points, 12 rebounds and 11 assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 47-12 on the season, while the Mavericks fall to 34-26.
